domino_project

Class BasicDominoLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino_project.SetOfTiles
      • domino_project.BasicDominoLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DominoLine

    public class BasicDominoLine
extends SetOfTiles
implements DominoLine
    This class represents the 'basic' DominoLine according to the idea: matching side of tiles means adding to Line.(used in games such as Hungarian,Solo1) e.g.[3,4] [4,1] [1,0]

      • fitsOnBeginning

        public short fitsOnBeginning(Tile tile)
        Description copied from interface: DominoLine
        Checks if the given tile fits on the Beggining of the line. It is supposed that if the line is empty, every tile fits the line. * "matches" depends on the rules of each version of DominoGames
        Specified by:
        fitsOnBeginning in interface DominoLine
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be checked
        Returns:
        1:if 1st tile matches the first tile in DominoLine (or line is empty) 2:if 2nd tile matches the first tile in DominoLine 3:if the first tile in DominoLine doesn't match any side of the tile
        See Also:
        {@inheritDoc} "matches" means that tiles have the same touching side e.g. [3,4][4,5] (4=4)

      • fitsAtTheEnd

        public short fitsAtTheEnd(Tile tile)
        Description copied from interface: DominoLine
        Checks if the given tile fits at the End of the line. "matches" depends on the rules of each version of DominoGames
        Specified by:
        fitsAtTheEnd in interface DominoLine
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be checked
        Returns:
        1:if 1st Tile matches the second tile (or line is empty) 2:if 2nd Tile matches the second tile 3:if the second tile doesn't match any side of the Tile
        See Also:
        {@inheritDoc} * "matches" means that tiles have the same touching side e.g. [3,4][4,5] (4=4)
